amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used by the Department of Education in violation of section 505 of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Responsibility Act of 1996 dealing with the granting of in-state tuition rates.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds from being spent by the Department of Education in violation of Section 505 of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Responsibility Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
